snippet: The figure is part of what the Romney campaign estimates will be a total of $1 billion spent in an effort to defeat President Obama.
abstract: The figure is part of what the Romney campaign estimates will be a total of $1 billion spent in an effort to defeat President Obama.

headline.main: $800 Million Target for Romney Campaign and Republican Committee
headline.print_headline: Romney Backers Set a Goal To Raise $800 Million by Fall
